message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You got greedy, now it's my turn to make a better offer!
I'll give you a bit more, but not too much, let's see if you'll accept!
You're not giving me enough, I'll take what I can get!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give in too easily!
You're getting desperate, I'll take the majority!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to let you take everything!
